name: DomoticChairControl
0:
”Alexa, launch Chair Control”
”Alexa, position one using Chair Control”
”Alexa, relax with Chair Control”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chair control
des:
"Domotic Chair Control" is the skill you need to control your domotic chair! Alexa will help you to move your armchair's headrest, backrest or footrest and set or recall favorite positions. You can control all the chairs you want, they just need to be compatibile with domoticsfurniture.com. 
Add the Skill "Chair Control" via the Alexa app and you will be immediately redirected or with Link Account Card to the site domoticsfurniture.com.
Register into the portal by creating a new account or using your Amazon account. Then add your devices using the smartphone application or with the code provided with the chair. Now give it a name, a number or any other TAG to identify the chair when using "Domotic Chair Control" and to fully enjoy the potential of the Skill.
It is as simple as: "Alexa, launch chair control", "legs up", "back down", "head up". Too demanding? Use keyword as "relax" and "close the chair" to enjoy a better experience.
